name: WP Frequently Replies
author: Hamid Reza Yazdani

sections.description:
If you have a blog where users have questions with repeated answers in the comments, or even if you have an online store and typing or copying/pasting repeated answers takes a lot of time, this plugin will help you get useful and beautiful answers to your users in the shortest possible time.
After installing and activating the plugin, just go to the “Frequently Replies” section under the comments menu and define your replies. From now on, by selecting any reply, add it to your user’s comment answer with one click.

Contribute and translate

Head to the WP Frequently Replies GitHub Repository to find out how you can pitch in.

WP Frequently Replies is translated into multiple languages, including English and Persian. Help localize WP Frequently Replies even further by adding your locale – visit translate.wordpress.org.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.4 or greater is required (PHP 8.0 or greater is recommended)
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater, OR MariaDB version 10.1 or greater, is required

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handle the file transfer, and you won’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WP Frequently Replies, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New.”

In the search field type “WP Frequently Replies,” then click “Search Plugins.” Once you’ve found us, you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by! Click “Install Now,” and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the WP Frequently Replies plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.
sections.faq:
Where can I report bugs?

Report bugs on the WP Frequently Replies GitHub repository.

WP Frequently Replies is awesome! Can I contribute?

Yes, you can! Join in on our GitHub repository to stay up-to-date with everything happening in the project.

short_description: If you are tired of copying/pasting duplicate responses to your user's comments, this plugin is for you
